channel.title: Client Errors
channel.description:
If i don't put the DSPK file into my C-Drive it just creates a DSPK file which doesn't have any of the files in it that the client requires. I have to replace the DSPK file it automatically makes with the propper one for the client to work otherwise i get 6 errors (Picture of these errors in the first link below). How can i make it so people dont need to manually add the working DSPK file and to maybe make it automatically add the correct file?
Look at these they should help.. http://i533.photobucket.com/albums/ee340/donjb/errorcollage.jpg (Errors ect) http://i533.photobucket.com/albums/ee340/donjb/dspkshouldlooklikethis.jpg (Working DSPK File)
- Thanks in advance

item.title: Client Errors
item.dc:creator: @zz_kronik_zz zz kronik zz
item.description:
@zz_kronik_zz wrote:

If i don’t put the DSPK file into my C-Drive it just creates a DSPK file which doesn’t have any of the files in it that the client requires. I have to replace the DSPK file it automatically makes with the propper one for the client to work otherwise i get 6 errors (Picture of these errors in the first link below). How can i make it so people dont need to manually add the working DSPK file and to maybe make it automatically add the correct file?

Look at these they should help…
